snp4.7:815: "Methunamanuyuttassa,Mussate vāpi sāsanaṁ;Micchā ca paṭipajjati,Etaṁ tasmiṁ anāriyaṁ.
snp4.7:816: Eko pubbe caritvāna,methunaṁ yo nisevati;Yānaṁ bhantaṁva taṁ loke,hīnamāhu puthujjanaṁ.
snp4.7:817: Yaso kitti ca yā pubbe,hāyate vāpi tassa sā;Etampi disvā sikkhetha,methunaṁ vippahātave.
snp4.7:818: Saṅkappehi pareto so,kapaṇo viya jhāyati;Sutvā paresaṁ nigghosaṁ,maṅku hoti tathāvidho.
snp4.7:819: Atha satthāni kurute,paravādehi codito;Esa khvassa mahāgedho,mosavajjaṁ pagāhati.
snp4.7:820: Paṇḍitoti samaññāto,ekacariyaṁ adhiṭṭhito;Athāpi methune yutto,mandova parikissati.
snp4.7:821: Etamādīnavaṁ ñatvā,Muni pubbāpare idha;Ekacariyaṁ daḷhaṁ kayirā,Na nisevetha methunaṁ.
snp4.7:822: Vivekaññeva sikkhetha,etaṁ ariyānamuttamaṁ;Na tena seṭṭho maññetha,sa ve nibbānasantike.
snp4.7:823: Rittassa munino carato,Kāmesu anapekkhino;Oghatiṇṇassa pihayanti,Kāmesu gadhitā pajā"ti.
